website_summaries.verdict: Extremely clear wide screen with 3440 x 1440 resolution and an excellent viewing angle for multiple people.
pros: High quality resolution in a 34" diagonal wide screen
Offers adjustable height and tilt for comfortable viewing
Several options for connecting to a computer
Slight curvature of monitor works great for immersive experience
cons: Corners and edges of screen suffer from distracting light bleed

customer_reviews.title: Replaces 3 monitors easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor to replace 3 aging widescreen 22" monitors I've had since 2007. I had some reservations if this single monitor would be able to adequately do the job. I was not disappointed. The real estate of this Dell Ultrawide is amazing. You can fit 3 windows in a single screen with enough information to still make it usable. The clarity and precision is also great. I'm a software architect by day, so I need as much real estate I can get to program, respond to email, and chat with my team. This makes it all happen with ease.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: Macbook pro USB-C
customer_reviews.text: I work in tech as a data scientist and I spend lots of time exploring/analyzing big messes of data. This monitor is perfect. I use this with a 2017 macbook pro. USB-C, paired with this dock I couldn't be happier with this monitor. It came with the cables I needed. Comes in a flat box and the minor assembly for the stand require no screws - just snaps into place securely. This is also my first curved monitor, and I love it. I prefer this monitor to two smaller side-by-side monitors. I can't imagine anyone regretting this. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: If you are like me who has been using 4K monitor for a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me who has been using 4K monitor for a while, then you probably cannot get back to 2k resolution. The build quality for this monitor is pretty good. However, the noticeable pixels really bothered me when I write my code or browse the internet. I guess this is a personal preference. Resolution aside, ultra wide screen is not as impressive as you think (unless you are a gamer). I'd choose a 31 inch regular monitor over this one.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Defective junk
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately started presenting flickering issues in single or dual screen mode. Swapped cables, no change in behavior. Not a windows 10 problem because I have the exact same model display next to it which is fine; swap them around and flickering. I don’t have the time for electronic nonsense anymore, don’t buy from companies like Dell unless you’re next door to a UPS or FedEx, because you’ll be spending time there for sure.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with 13" MacBook Pro (late 2016)
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with a 13" MacBook Pro w/ Touchbar (late 2016). Have it connected from the Monitor's DisplayPort to one of the Laptops's USB-C plugs (search Amazon for part no. JCA141). Works flawlessly - as a replacement for a dual screen setup. The resolution is great, as is the color for my use (business, programming etc). Have added a photo of this monitor on a 24" deep by 60" long (smallish) desk - leaves plenty of space for my needs. Minus one star as at night, on a black screen there is very noticeable backlight bleed in all four corners.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this monitor, the real-estate on the display is pretty spectacular. Dell Display Manager makes it super easy to be able to resize the windows and the number of panels you want. I write a lot of code and this screen makes it easier to be able to see multiple applications at once. My previous setup was 2 24" dell monitors which really limited me to resolution. Now with this new Dell Ultra wide I am able to run my DELL Precision 7510 laptop to its fullest capacity. The speakers are actually pretty decent! Very happy with this purchase:)
customer_reviews.author: illestcrooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Moved from 3 external 19" LCD displays (1280 x1024) on old laptop to a new Dell 7710 Laptop utilizing this in place of the three externals. Very easy transition and both text and graphics display are excellent (HDMI). I first installed using mini displayport connection, but monitor would "blink" every once in awhile - not a problem with HDMI. I would highly recommend this and the price was great. I installed the Dell display software, but it is not needed and actually was a bit bothersome - I uninstalled.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: An amazing monitor
customer_reviews.text: For me, the curve is perfect. I replaced a 4k monitor I had been using that wasn't really that great in practical terms - for work. This thing provides a great layout for work and it's rad for gaming. The only thing that would make the monitor better is if it had a higher pixel density ... that was a slight trade off coming from a 4k monitor. Worth it imo.
customer_reviews.author: okor

customer_reviews.title: Dell 34 Ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. I'm coming from a single Dell 27 monitor. Takes a little while to get used to the curved screen. I can double my screen for productivity. Games are more immersive. I'm happy with everything so far and would not go back to the 27.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Best screen I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This monitor will blow your mind. The price is great, clarity is amazing, sturdy, even has side usb ports which are nice. The usb ports do not work however when monitor is powered off. Also there is very very slight light bleed in corners if screen is totally black in a completely dark room. I LOVE THIS SCREEN!!!!! Next year Dell Please make a version that has G-sync!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good monitor, but I had a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: I love the widescreen and I no longer use multiple monitors. Lots of light bleed on the corners. The light bleed looks bad when displaying a black image. In practice I don't notice any problems. the included USB cable included didn't work, I had to use my own. The USB hub switch makes this monitor very convenient to use with two computers.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor--my first ultra wide
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great. It's very bright and the curve is very comfortable. The aspect ratio (ultra wide) took some getting used to but I adapted very quickly and would never go back. The built-in speakers are just okay--not great and not too bad. I'd say that they're good for system sounds and background music listening but a bit lacking for gaming at high volume. Get a bluetooth speaker instead. But the monitor itself is excellent, and at $900 is an excellent price. I highly recommend this monitor to anyone for gaming, word processing, spreadsheets and other work functions, surfing the web, and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: T. T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrawide monitor with none of the issues I've experienced with other 34'' ultrawides.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding monitor. There is a little light bleed in the corners when viewing a completely black screen. But who stares at a black screen? Any other time, you will never notice the light bleed. I previously had an LG 34'' ultrawide but had to return it because of horrible ghosting (images burn into the monitor and can be seen for hours later in that same spot). This monitor has no negative issues that I've noticed and just works like you'd expect a monitor to. I use it for gaming and for productivity apps and I have no complaints in either regard.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Love it... volume sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these monitors and certainly don't regret the purchase. I had buyers remorse when I ordered them but it quickly went away. Two small everyday items I would love to see changed. 1. On my Mac I am unable to adjust the volume via the mac itself. Bummer since doing this via the menu is clumsy. 2. I like the shortcuts, but only two are available. I need it for PIP, Input source & Volume. Again... makes things clumsy and a little irritating. The monitors look fantastic and work very well for what I do. I need lots of screen real-estate but honestly, don't do enough graphics to truly judge it on that level.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great choice for Mac computers
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is "OK"--not great. I'm not happy with the image quality based on other displays that I have used. The connectivity is poorly done. Unfortunately it does not appear to support driving the USB peripherals via DisplayPort which is a big disappointment. Accessing the brightness and sound controls is extremely clunky and not a smooth process. I will be returning this display and buying something else (likely LG).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kluin

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for a curved wide screen monitor for my main PC at home and have always loved the Dell ultrasharp line. Well this does not disappoint. How ever i did have to upgrade the graphics card to utilize the HDMI and display ports. That was not so bad as the current card was 4 years old. Great display and very happy with this purchase. Looking at getting rid of my two 24 inch monitors now and getting one of these for my work configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Helt

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and some light gaming. It enabled me to replace two monitors with one, improving ergonomics, and it reduced clutter and cable management problems. I love the built-in KVM and use it to switch between my work and personal computers. No dead pixels. Perfect condition. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity and color - couldn't love it more
customer_reviews.text: I am an unapologetic monitor snob - I've rarely had a monitor I couldn't find some complaint about (for example, Dell's first 27" monitors were far too matte). This monitor is outstanding. Colors are vivid, display is sharp, and the screen perfectly finds that Goldilocks zone between too matte and too glossy. I previously had dual monitors - a 27" and a 24". I'll never go back to duals now - the amount of real estate on this monitor is amazing. <eyes the U38 longingly> The automatic USB switching with current video input was also a welcome surprise. For $700 I'll probably buy another one of these for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Backlight bleeding, 2 bad pixels, but otherwise amazing
customer_reviews.text: Only had 2 dead pixels and the pixels are small enough individually that it is hard to notice most of the time; blacklight bleeding in the bottom left and right corners expands about three inches across, one inch vertically, and is pretty distracting when watching movies, because the sidebars on the screen are black. If backlight bleed drives you nuts, I would avoid this monitor. I find the extra space and curved design makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Groanan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good monitor with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I really love this monitor. It has a very sharp and bright picture. It works great for me viewing large spreadsheets and process flows. You will see some light bleed if the screen is all black but that does not bother me at all. I really like the wide screen format although I wish it was about an in or so taller it would go better with my 32in Asus monitor but that is it. I don’t play games but I can tell you for productivity and web browsing it gets the job done very well.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning rendition of a 1080p display
customer_reviews.text: After playing some video-games on my new desktop computer with a GTX 1080 (meaning maxed out 1080p graphics at solid 60 frames!) I can NOT go back. Flat screens are just too dull and don't provide the sense of immersion that a curved screen provides. Imagine playing The Witcher 3 on this thing. Insane. The opening gambit against the griffon becomes something intense when played on the hardest difficulty, with most settings maxed out, and at a solid locked 60 frames a second with this display.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: This a a great monitor. The brightness, color, and clarity are amazing. I'm a software developer and occasional gamer. I'm sharing the monitor with a MacBook 13" using USB-C to DisplayPort connector and a PC using the DisplayPort to Mini DisplayPort connector that came with the monitor. One feature that is not advertised is the monitor has a built in KVM function. You can plug a keyboard and mouse into the monitor and when you switch sources it switches the downstream USB port to the same source; completely eliminates the need for a KVM!
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but I sit in front of these things 10 hours a day.
customer_reviews.text: Same height as my 27" monitor but a LOT wider. I hooked this to a dell m6800 laptop along with my original 27" external monitor. I use the displayport for the new one and the HDMI port of the 27" one. I have the standard AMD Fire pro card in my PC. Using the AMD Radion Pro utility I went to the 'Custom Resolutions' Tab and set the resolution to 3440x1440 and the refresh rate to 75hz. It didn't like the 75Hz but I have read that others have used it so I set the 'Timing Standard' to CVT along with the 75Hz (it was Manual) and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Dell has much better text quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought HP 34 inch wide initially, as it was a preferred model from the company vendor, and replaced it with this Dell few days later. Dell has much better text quality, color are right out of the box, it is much better in terms of light reflection (there is a window behind my desk). Very happy with this model, only wish I had considered Dell 38 inch wide as well.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Sh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitors for the price and flexibility - no comparisons that I could find
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Monitors for all types of work and viewing - not good for detailed cad/cam design due to the curvature. I use two of them with between 2 and three computers concurrently on occasion and can only do so because of the very flexible dell display manager software. I am only using these for professional use. And they have better warranties than any others.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This does as described and is a good monitor. Just like all the other reviews it is so good. The problem is the price. I could have got 2 28” 4K monitors cheaper than this thing. However this a good monitor. Just not sure it’s worth the cost to me or the company
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Neff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice work monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer but I had one of these at work and really enjoy the "real estate" on one screen vs side by side monitors. This is not a cheap monitor but for me it was inexpensive enough and not a compromise which side by side monitors are.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Replace the stand due to slight shaking, otherwise awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: The stand on this monitor has a tendency to amplify monitor shaking from typing on a keyboard or using a mouse. You may not notice initially but few other buyers mentioned this too. Of course initially I assumed it must have been their whimsy desks ;) I replaced the stock stand with an adjustable arm and that solved my problem very well. It may cause "unexplained" headaches over extended periods of use if you ignore this. PS. I use a professional "Jarvis" desk; it's very sturdy, I think.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Finally pulled the trigger on this - also bought the deck to hook up my laptop. Working from home is so much easier! I can easily view multiple documents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen went bad after 3 months (see video)
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is sufficient for work. The monitor’s sound system is atrocious. The monitor did not come with an operator’s manual. Edit: After 3 months of ownership the monitor does not work properly. The screen randomly glitches/rapidly draws lines making the screen unreadable. Please see video.
customer_reviews.author: qazqwer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive except for a slight light bleed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing clarity and love the USB hub for the keyboard and mouse. It automatically switches depending on which computer/laptop you connect. The 4 stars is because (inspite of returning the first one), almost all the monitors have a slight light bleed on the left corner area. You don't see it under normal use unless you start looking for it. Anyway for the price that you pay for this monitor, the light bleeds are unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Ideal for college students who work/edit and gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between the LG 34UC98-W and Dell U3417W. I went ahead and bought the Dell because it was cheaper than the LG. I don't regret it one bit. It is a great monitor and offers the immersive experience. It is cheaper than the LG and provides users for gaming and work. I was worried I was going to need Nvidia G-SYNC and 100-160h. Turns out I don't because I game mostly on my Xbox One s. The 21:9 screen is excellent for gaming and makes the game more immersive. 60h is high during gaming and enough for me. If you need more, obviously go with the LG or Asus.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It provides wide viewing of spreadsheets as well as side by side documents that I can work on together.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Holoubek

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. My unit gets very hot when ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. My unit gets very hot when I leave it on and during the summer (70F) it reaches about 90-100 degrees and can make the room warm with hours of use. Also the matte screen does not work well with windows in the room when using dark programs as the entire panel is glaring. I never had the issue with a glossy 27" screen (though I did have reflections but this was more useable).
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: So much space
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I can detect very little bleed from the edges. The color reproduction is spot on. The curve is not as much as I expected, the extra screen space takes some time to get used too. I am finding no cons so far. Monitor comes with a 6 foot long displayport to displayport cable and a 6 foot displayport to Mini Displayport cable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Madmac

customer_reviews.title: Dell monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is quite big. I've been using Dell monitor 24" that I got back in 2005 , it still works and I plan to continue to use it in a 2 monitor setup. I do find that watching Netflix on the new monitor that it's a little darker than I like. Otherwise I have no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and loads of room
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this monitor. I have SO much more room to work. As a developer who frequently has several screens open, it's perfect. At home, I can run video and still have loads of room to work on other things. I haven't tried the speaker as I use a bluetooth speaker, so can't comment on that. The resolution is fine though not exactly Retina. I'm very happy I made the purchase and heartily recommend it if you need more screen real estate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Branner

customer_reviews.title: Ultrawide is aweseome
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the screen. Ultrawide is 100x better then 2 separate monitors. No vertical adjustment (slide up/down) on screen, but does tip. On screen ports seem to work well. If you have USB-C, might be worth getting the upgraded model.
customer_reviews.author: CoryH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor, big increase in productivity
customer_reviews.text: This size and resolution monitor is SOOOOOO nice!!! Wow, I am now officially jealous of my son, who got it as a present. He is an engineering student en this enables him to keep so many full windows open so really increases his productivity. Better than a multi monitor solution!
customer_reviews.author: farcha

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor, it's perfect for my trading even if...
customer_reviews.text: ... After a week it started to display annoying horizontal gray lines. Since it was a defect, Amazon + Dell prompted replaced in 24h. Amazon + Dell = amazing post-selling service.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Garulli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor from the Amazon Warehouse was a Fantastic Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this monitor, it has all the features I want/need and its performance exceeds my expectations. I was concerned at first because this product was being sold by the Amazon Warehouse, which I understood to be where items that had been returned were sold. This 34" monitor (purchased for an amazing price) arrived well packed, complete with all the parts, was exactly as described, and has worked flawlessly from the moment it was set up, and continues to work fantastically (thankfully) four months later. From my experience, don't be hesitate to purchase items from the Amazon Warehouse. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mandy smart davidson

customer_reviews.title: Huge Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is no joke. Build quality is really good, screen clarity is very nice, brightness is really good. I would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I ESPECIALLY LIKE THE AUTO MODE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. I especially like the AUTO MODE where the monitor will automatically change its settings from Multimedia, game, and standard. I have zero pixel issues. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: these monitors so far have been great. The color accuracy compared to my Macbook Pro ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these monitors so far have been great. The color accuracy compared to my Macbook Pro 15" (Late 2016) screen have been pretty close, and that's typically the bar that I utilize for work purposes. Dell has always done well with color configuration. The displays are sufficiently configurable, and the only issue that I've had with them knocking the 1 start out of my rating would be light bleed at the corners of the screens as other reviews have mentioned. This is for the most part a non-issue for me as the price versus quality is very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Another home run for Dell
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is excellent. The high resolution lets me work on three documents at once. Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Goryunov

customer_reviews.title: full of horizontal lines.  just out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. There are full of horizontal lines. I am sad that it was out of warranty for only 1 month. I will not buy any DELL stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - has 2 HDMI ports
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this DELL monitor. There are 2 HDMI ports and plenty of USB if you want to use a Microsoft wireless adapter. Also plays well with my Panasonic BlueRay player. Found not dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: impressive screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality . very wide !! Having issues adjusting to needs with our software .
customer_reviews.author: MARIE P.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for price, try Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Great color, brightness, price, but the screen wobbles a little when I type. Very willing to overlook this considering that I got it for $230 cheaper by getting it from Amazon Warehouse Deals.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor F

customer_reviews.title: I love how much screen space I have
customer_reviews.text: I'm a software engineer and I use this at home with my macbook pro. I love how much screen space I have, and I'm planning on buying a second one so I can have 4 workspaces up at once. The picture quality is great, and everything appears really sharp.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing picture quality. The width is very nice for large spreadsheets, but overall 2 27inch monitors is way better for productivity. The picture quality is super disappointing as there is no contrast. Would not recommend. Just got with 2 27s.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I wish Dell could figure on how to code a controller interface.
customer_reviews.author: DuGo2Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture, very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, very good monitor. But I don't like that the upstream USB being separated between two machines. I have multiple machines, but half of the USB ports can only be used with a single machine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alder

customer_reviews.title: One word... INCREDIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I took the plunge into purchasing a premium monitor in an effort to get away from multiple monitors. I am completely blown away by how amazing this Dell curved monitor is. My favorite purchase in the last 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: bszen27

customer_reviews.title: Great screen poor audio
customer_reviews.text: The screen is wonderful. I love the size color and clarity. The audio is terrible and sounds like it is coming from a tin can.
customer_reviews.author: USMCUAV

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Been working well. Great size, stand allows you to move it up and down. Buttons to adjust the settings I dont find to be that big of a deal. Just takes a tiny bit of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great for work.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for a home office. It compliments my Mac Book Pro nicely, which is my primary work machine. I picked it up for $499, and feel like I got a decent deal. These things are way overpriced IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: If you need a high rez monitor for CAD or graphics then this is it. Good color, crisp and functional. This aspect ratio is very good for multiple documents displayed side by side, CAD, project schedules and excel spreadsheets.
customer_reviews.author: edo

customer_reviews.title: Dell Support is terrible. Went blank after 58 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the monitor. It stopped working 58 days after I set it up. Dell Support passes you along to various departments and you finally get tired of plugging and unplugging for several hours. So be aware if it goes down it is a long slog to decide the overseas support system is trained to drag you down this road. Last Dell I buy..
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Rock

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels and the stand was broken when arrived!
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixels and the stand was broken when arrived. In addition of course backlight bleeds.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. The resolution for gaming is fantastic. The speakers are adequate for watching netflix or whatever. There are other technical reviews so I wont copy them. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Waltman

customer_reviews.title: Nice momitor. Great for multitasking.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the wide view that this monitor offers. Super helpful for multitasking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes as described
customer_reviews.text: Just a great monitor that was cheaper on Amazon than anywhere else (including Dell.com) and came with free two day shipping under prime.
customer_reviews.author: Harry P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to have two computer view at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. I needed a monitor to be able to split the screen for two computers.
customer_reviews.author: Jose H Cortes

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. bought on prime day deal. its good price and good quality. only concern is sometime the screen has a little time lag. first time to use the curve screen, its cool. best experience is to watch netflix on this computer, fantastic display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... with my new Alienware Aurora R6 and couldn't be happier. The screen real-estate is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Set this up with my new Alienware Aurora R6 and couldn't be happier. The screen real-estate is phenomenal. Clarity and brightness is great, no noticeable bleeding issues. I plan to add a second one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I can easily have 4-5 windows open
customer_reviews.text: Just got this monitor and hooked up to my MacBook Pro. No more crook in my neck from using multiple monitors to do work. I can easily have 4-5 windows open, using all at the same time. I use this for business, doing research and preparing presentations. Such value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So annoying.
customer_reviews.text: High frequency noise around power switch(by that internal power adapter) when goes power saving. damn. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lee

customer_reviews.title: My experience with DELL monitors is prettybad
customer_reviews.text: The third fail of this DELL monitor - over a 2 year period. Third time is the charm - will not be buying a DELL monitor again
customer_reviews.author: 10000 Ways

customer_reviews.title: quite good.
customer_reviews.text: can`t believe. i received it with perpect condition. and everythins of it facisnite me. i think except monitor itself, itself still good. two things is nocitable. 1.really easy to assemble. but, incredly durable. 2.monitor sound is beyond my expection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going ultrawide, curved is the way to go. ...
customer_reviews.text: Going ultrawide, curved is the way to go. I have needed a new monitor for years and this was well worth the wait. If I could I would replace the two 24" at work with this.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It's just beautiful and there's so much room for activities
customer_reviews.text: This upgrade changed my experience on the level of adding a SSD 7-8 years ago. It's just beautiful and there's so much room for activities.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Konkol

customer_reviews.title: Short. Simple. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Easy set up (few mins) Very good sound All in all, very happy about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Dasic

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good, but a few comments
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good, but a few comments. It is a bit glossier than my last UltraSharp, so it picks up more reflections in the same room. The backlight bleeds a bit at the bottom, windows management is more work with a single wide screen then two regular monitors, but when you get your windows set up correctly it can be glorious.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Devereux

customer_reviews.title: When Dell gets it right, they really get it right
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a month now. The picture is super-clear, and it's great to have 4-5 screens opened at once. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: PaulG

customer_reviews.title: If you use big spreadsheets........ this is what you want
customer_reviews.text: Have been completely impressed - build quality up to dell spec; text sharp, quite the immersive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to work on
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to work on, the adjustments are easy to make. Software has some useful features. Does take up real estate, even with the articulating arm, but until they get holography together...
customer_reviews.author: personaobscura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing monitor. coming from 2x24, this is way better, since I can expand apps “as wide as I want”
customer_reviews.author: L. Caballes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor ever, switched from a dual monitor to this. I wish I had four this sooner. I love the different split screen options.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ8800

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I used to always have two monitors so I could have more desktop space, but now that I have this there is no need for a second monitor. The clarity is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Light bleeding in dark scenes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Light bleeding in dark scenes, as all other reviews online probably mention, however I almost always use for video editing and for very games
customer_reviews.author: The Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to get something so wide, but after having it for 2 weeks, I can't imagine going back to a 27" monitor. Excellent picture quality. Nice having extra USB ports on the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal monitor for productivity and programming. Never gamed on it, so no feedback there. The built-in kvm is a great add on, as is the PIP! I have an Amazon firetv stick plugged into the hdmi and having a nice little PIP with whatever going while I work is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John P Herold

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY - HISSING NOISE/ELECTRICAL WINE
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: THIS MONITOR INTERMITTENTLY MAKES A TERRIBLE HISSING NOISE. THE NOISE IS 'QUIET,' BUT IT'S TOTALLY UNACCEPTABLE IN A POST-PRODUCTION MIXING SUITE. IF YOU ARE A RECORDING STUDIO THINKING ABOUT PURCHASING THIS MONITOR, I WOULD SERIOUSLY RECOMMEND YOU STAY AWAY FROM DELL PRODUCTS. CUSTOMER SUPPORT WAS NOT HELPFUL. THE ISSUE IS NOT MY POWER SUPPLY. I AM RUNNING THE MONITOR ON A CLEAN ELECTRIC LINE WITH A POWER CONDITIONER. I HAVE TRIED MANY DIFFERENT CABLES (HDMI AND POWER) WITH NO AVAIL. The monitor looks good, but I can't believe Dell would let this product out the door with obvious defects.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product line! Take a look at the 37”
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, but check out my review in the slight larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: The best one for office usage
customer_reviews.text: The best choice for quality and price, it is super for you work-from-home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this during Prime week and got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Swett Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Monitor that Increases Producitiviy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor for 4 months now. Great product that has really increased efficiency since so much more can be shown clearly on one window.I would recommend to others and will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Crazy cool monitor. Tons of real estate.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much real-estate is here. Amazing for professional work like coding, Adobe software, and video editing. Like having two monitors next to each other. It's crazy cool.
customer_reviews.author: R Dur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has made working from home the best! Everyone is envious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of use and it won't display picture any more the backlight turns on but no picture
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Barcenas

customer_reviews.title: But It...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say about this monitor is "BUY IT". It has the best screen that I have seen on a wide screen monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Wideglide

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Moved to this from my apple thunderbolt display and absolutely LOVE it! FWIW, I also tried last year's model but liked this one better (more curve).
customer_reviews.author: Changing Lanes

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: The speed of playing the game is ok , the picture quality seems not to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor every 3 minutes it goes black
customer_reviews.text: Is anyone having a problem with the monitor cutting out? I have owned this for less than 3 months - I can no longer return it to Amazon and now am having to deal with Dell as my screen is cutting out every 3 minutes (I have checked cables and power sources).
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor. Fantastic resolution and the space!!! Just makes working so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dapper Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing monitor I have ever had the pleasure to use in 20 years of professional computing.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, I see no backlight bleed at all. FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.author: D from B

customer_reviews.title: Zero dead pixel and excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Zero dead pixel and excellent picture quality. A little bit of light leak in the corner but it's expected for an IPS panel. Perfect work monitor and great for casual gaming too.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Dell computer screen.
customer_reviews.text: Had a electrical fault. Sent back to Amazon same day. waiting to hear from them. Looks like it will be a pretty awesome display though. Waiting to hear on replacement yet.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

product_meta.title: Dell U3417W FR3PK 34-Inch Screen Led-Lit Monitor, Single
product_meta.description: Style:SingleDell UltraSharp 34 curved Ultra wide monitor - u3417w. The brightness is 300 cd/m². Panel Type - In-Plane Switching Technology. Viewing Angle: 178 Degrees vertical / 178 Degrees horizontal.
feature_bullets: Creates a heightened sense of immersion, 34 inches diagonal wide viewing experience with an Array of connectivity
Enhanced clarity: full WQHD 3440 1440 clarity at 60 Hertz and consistent colors across an ultra wide 178 degree/172 degree viewing angle combine to create a more appealing Display
Multiple connections: with HDMI 2.0, MHL, DP, mini dp, 2 x USB 3.0 upstream, 4 x USB 3.0 downstream ports, audio out, connecting to all your secondary devices at once is both easy and convenient

Powerful 18W integrated speakers; Compatibility All Operating System; Dimensions with stand (H x W x D) Depth 226.4 millimeter (8.91 inches) Height Compressed 417.0 millimeter (16.42 inches); Extended 532.0 millimeter (20.94 inches); Width 813.6 millimeter (32.03 inches); Dimensions without stand (H x W x D)Height 363.7 millimeter (14.32 inches); Width 813.6 millimeter (32.03 inches); Depth 58.4 millimeter (2.30 inches)
Height adjustable (115 millimeter), tilt and swivel , Operating Temperature 0 degree Celsius to 40 degree Celsius ,Non operating Temperature 20 degree Celsius to 60 degree Celsius
